scripts.preinstall: node-gyp configure clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build
scripts.postinstall: if [[ `node -p process.platform` == 'darwin' ]]; then cp build/Release/authenticate_pam.node bin/darwin_x64; elif [[ `node -p process.platform` == 'linux' ]];then cp build/Release/authenticate_pam.node bin/linix_x64; else echo 'Could not match platform - defauling to Release build'; fi;
